name: V7 Go
tagline: AI-powered lease abstraction that processes documents 12x faster with 99.5% accuracy
description: V7 Go is a generative AI platform for real estate document intelligence. It processes leases, amendments, and correspondence using OCR, RAG, and large language models. Reduces lease abstraction from 4-8 hours to 15-20 minutes with 99.5% accuracy. Features AI Citations linking every data point to its source document.
